events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and some outstanding debt consolidation.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised under Personal Loan based on the purpose mentioned as medical and debt repayment.
A loan officer was assigned to the file to assist the applicant with any further documentation and questions regarding the personal loan.
The initial review of the personal loan application has been completed, confirming the completeness of the initial submission.
Additional documents requested from the applicant include recent pay stubs, medical bills, and bank statements for verification.
The applicant submitted all requested documents, including proof of income and medical statements, which completed the file.
A credit check was performed indicating a reasonable credit score with manageable existing debts compared to income.
Risk assessment analyzed with moderate risk due to some outstanding debts but stable employment and income history.
A loan offer was presented to the applicant with terms suitable for the requested personal loan covering medical bills and debt consolidation.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer, expressing satisfaction with the terms and repayment period proposed.
The loan application was escalated to senior management for approval due to the loan amount exceeding standard personal loan limits.
The personal loan application was officially approved after review by senior management and confirmation of all necessary documentation.
Loan funds were successfully disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account to cover the planned medical expenses and debt payments.
A follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant is managing repayments and to offer any support or financial advice needed.
The personal loan application process was closed successfully after confirmation that all post-funding requirements were met.
